website_summaries.verdict: Tropical Freeze features tons of creative stages across varies environments, a lovable cast, and a genuine challenge that Nintendo Switch owners need to play.
pros: Diddy, Dixie, and Cranky help DK return home to kick the conquering Snowmads off DK Island
Forgiving Funky Kong mode for inexperienced players
cons: A little on the pricy side

website_summaries.verdict: As atmospheric, exciting, as difficult as you want it to be, and brilliantly fun for all ages. You’ll want to return to DK’s frozen jungle to collect every last hidden secret after the credits roll.
pros: Explore the Savannah, beaches, coral reefs and other stunning environments as Donkey, Diddy, Dixie, and Cranky Kong bounce and bop their way through tons of challenging levels
cons: This isn’t an easy adventure, but if you’re having trouble, you can breeze through the game’s “easy mode” by playing as Funky Kong

customer_reviews.title: I loved it on Wii U, I Love it on Switch.
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for free in the final days of Club Nintendo, and I had a blast with it. Now I can enjoy it again in a better format. I am glad to own it on Switch for the obvious reason that it is portable, and the game looks noticeably better. I personally think that all of these re-releases should not be full price, but it's not that big of a deal, especially when you're having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jor

customer_reviews.title: Fun game! 🍌
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game! I never played it with previous Nintendo systems because my Nintendo switch is my first Nintendo system since the owning N64. I think it’s worth getting if you’ve never owned or played the game before.
customer_reviews.author: Daze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game, challenging yet rewarding
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game, challenging yet rewarding. Level design and soundtrack is top notch. Not even upset about paying full price for a port after having played this, Wii U basically never existed anyway, right?
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, its a great game and definitely has a nostalgia feel. The graphics are similar, but better. The rythmn of the game is eerily similar to the originals. The sound track fits the franchise perfectly. So why not a perfect 5? It never had me hooked. Maybe as I grew up, these side scrollers aren't as great as the 3D versions of the game anymore. They are simple and you worry about beating them too fast. At least that's what happens to me when playing these side scrollers now since I am having the same feeling with the new Mario bros u deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: The case was empty. No cartridge or insert was included.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sold and shipped an empty case to my 11-year-old, son who used a gift card he received for Christmas to purchase the game to take on a trip. I'm sure the game will be fun to play, once he actually gets it. Amazon failed. Update: Amazon did immediately ship a new game, and my son was finally able to play. He does really like the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Best platformer I've ever played!
customer_reviews.text: As someone playing games since the 80s and fondly remembering Donkey Kong Country on the SNES I figured I'd try this one with my kids. A lot of these games end up feeling like quickly put together money grabs, so my expectations weren't that high, but boy was I surprised. Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze is probably the best platformer I've played. The level design, gameplay, puzzles, worlds, characters, art, music, etc. all are very well done. The game is a bit difficult for younger kinds, but you can play in co-op mode with Funky Kong and it makes it more bearable. Pleasant surprise, lots of fun, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Ward

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful game with music from the original Donkey Kong Country's ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the Wii u but never played this game on it. This is a wonderful game with music from the original Donkey Kong Country's in beautiful modernized fashion. The gameplay is very clean and the graphics are amazing. I love all the levels I've played so far and I can't wait to dive in deeper. I'm going to go through the game getting at least all the letters then I'll go back and get all the puzzle pieces and DKs. Between this, Breath of the Wild, and Odyssey, I'll be busy for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It’s not on like Donky Kong!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about this game and neither is anyone in the family. None of my online gamer friends play it either. I think this was way over priced for what it is. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, little pricey for a Port
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun game with new modes If you played it on the WiiU then its not a whole bunch different, played this ona friends switch so i had to get a copy. Just a little pricey for a port if you already owned the WiiU version, good price if you never owned it before. Also beware, I noticed it had a PEGI 3 rating label on the cover, seems the PAL (Nintendo of Europe) version is mixed in the Amazon North American batch. I dont know if that will affect multiplayer portion with another Switch user, but im getting a replacement for mine hoping it will be the NTSC North American version to avoid any issues.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaNutjob

customer_reviews.title: So much funky fun!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really great to have Tropical Freeze on Switch! I’ve been having a blast playing as Funky. He isn’t invincible as some might think. If you want some fantastic good fun with the Kong’s and never played it on the U then get it now!!! Funky just adds to the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Way better than Mario odyssey this game is actually challenging, graphics and little storylines with the bosses are really cute and entertaining. My only gripe is that it was very short with only 6 worlds and 5-6 levels per world, also there’s “secret exits” that aren’t mentioned anywhere in the game I had to google why I wasn’t able to access a level on each world. Overall it was definitely worth the price I haven’t found a game this fun in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: classic feel.
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. I grew up in the 90s, and the Super Nintendo Donkey Kong games are some of my favorites of all time. this feels exactly the same to me only upgraded and updated greatly. i never owned a Wii U, so this is my first chance the play this game and frankly am glad Nintendo made a port of it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: We didn't like the game at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend because we both played DK games growing up. We both disliked almost everything about this game. To keep it brief, the controls were bizarre, the physics were infuriating and the level design was gimmicky over engaging.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Failed
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing Donkey Kong country on the SNES (1,2, and 3!) this version is just awful. Poor control, the levels are designed to be a mess, and the storyline falls flat. I kept waiting for it to get better but eventually just stopped playing it. If you’re a fan of original DK, you won’t like this one. Doesn’t fill the nostalgia
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. I was a big fan of the DK series on SNES growing up, and this one doesn’t disappoint. Nostalgic music from the old games is brought back to life in DK: Tropical Freeze. Smooth game and just challenging enough to keep you entranced. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: was hoping that this game would be comparable to the ...
customer_reviews.text: was hoping that this game would be comparable to the older DKC1 2 and 3 games from the SNES, it does not have the same feel as those games, guess I'm just stuck in the past
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: challenging but fun
customer_reviews.text: Funky Kong is nice addition because DK games can be more difficult. Some of these levels can be challenging but playing as funky kong you should be able to get 100%. The only levels that are very difficult even with funky kong are the bonus k levels. Other than that it was a very fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best 2D Platformers
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best 2D platformers ever. Every single level has a different and new gameplay mechanic that it introduces, which keeps you interested throughout the whole experience. Gameplay is very well done. Soundtrack is also amazing. The game never felt too easy either, it was always challenging and fun. If you like good platformers, check DKC Tropical Freeze out.
customer_reviews.author: chickfred

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: If you haven’t played this game already make yourself a favor and buy it right now! Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze is one of the best games for Wii U now available for Nintendo Switch. Beautiful graphics, awesome music by David Wise , unique stages design , crazy difficulty , all of this makes a modern classic Nintendo game brought you by Retro Studios. Buy it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario G.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the traditional DK games
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and have played all the DK games on every console, you'll like this one. It's just gives you a nostalgic feeling because it's basically the same concept of every game. The controls are a little funky, but other than that it's a safe game to buy. Because I've played so many of the DK game series, it gets a little boring.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but poor controls
customer_reviews.text: Game controls are lacking. Can’t super jump or super run like Mario. Played this game for a couple of days and got tired of it. Now, it’s collecting dust and I may end up donating it to goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Switch games currently available.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for something extra to play never realized how good this game is. Hands down one of the best platform games on any system. Graphics are beautiful in hand held mode or docked. Tight controls and awesome story. Difficult without being Mega Man pull my hair out difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: Like Donkey Kong? Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of the Donkey Kong games and this one was a blast. It was exciting from the moment I started playing all the way until the end. Wasn’t the most difficult game but worth buying it and playing it over and over until I get everything gets completely achieved.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great family game.
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! We just bought our Nintendo switch and needed to get some family games. This was a perfect choice for our new collection! All of my children had a blast and were never bored with the game. The graphics were very good and the detail was on point. The kids love playing this game and so do the adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gill

customer_reviews.title: Donkey Kong Excellence.
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the Wii U version, so if you missed out on that, this is definitely worth the purchase. The music is incredible as usual, and it's actually quite a challenging platformer (but I like challenges). The new Funky Kong mode is essentially an 'easy mode', so that's a plus for those who want to breeze through the game. Overall one of the best Nintendo titles. GET THIS GAME!
customer_reviews.author: buckdave

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. So much fun. It brings the kid out of me again. The music is great, the graphics is great, and the color is great. I have to put the real kids to bed so I could be a kid again and play all night. This time my mom can't tell me to turn it off or ground me. hehe. So addictive.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel White

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good game
customer_reviews.text: This was an overall good port! Looks and feels great on the switch and had a fun time playing it. Do think it was a pretty penny for a port of a OLD game but that's Nintendo for you and obviously its working for them since I bought it. Besides that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Super funky!
customer_reviews.text: My two older daughters and I love playing this on the Switch. Great graphics either docked or in handheld mode. This version offers the challenging original game as well as “funky” mode which makes it that much more accessible to smaller kids (and dads who haven’t played video games in a while).
customer_reviews.author: Matt_Dad_of_3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My brother loved this Nintendo Switch Donkey Kong game for his birthday!!! He’s a video game fan, so this was a perfect gift for him! It was absolutely a great gift!!! He plays it all the time, and enjoys it! It was packaged really well, and it arrived quick!!! It was a pleasure doing business with you!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great sequel for DK fans.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game and looks great on the Switch. Funky Kong definitely makes the game more accessible (easy). I loved DK country 1 and 2 back on the SNES and while the newer sequels are cool, not quite as good as those two originals. Its a fun platformer though!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: EU version instead of NA version as shown in the listing
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered me an EU version of the game instead of the NA version as depicted in the listing. Not really a deal breaker since the Nintendo Switch is region free and the game should still work fine. But I hope that Amazon is more transparent about what region games it delivers to people especially when they don't match up with the version shown in the listing, as that can be a real deal breaker if the console was region locked.
customer_reviews.author: David Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoyed this game. It wasn’t too challenging, like other previous DK games, but it was enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Another good game
customer_reviews.text: Another game that my elementary aged boys are loving. Reminds me a little of my childhood looking at the box but when the game is actually playing I am so blown away by the quality in detail that it's nothing like what I play twenty years ago. The great product and keeps them busy for hours when we allow them TV time.
customer_reviews.author: PHS Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good game but hard
customer_reviews.text: It's a good game and all but it's super hard and honestly they really need to lower the price. This game came out years ago and there just asking way to much but besides the price fact it's a good game but would be difficult for younger kids
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the Donkey Kong name
customer_reviews.text: Really dissappointed by this game. Compared to Mario Odyssey and Zelda, this game pales. Felt like I was playing an app game on my phone to be honest. Cool little secrets and near impossible challenges and obstacles but the 2d horizontal left to right play all the way through was a huge yawn. Doesn't say much for the Switch platform if mediocre games are being charged top price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Joffe

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful game that deserves to be played by all fans ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought back fond memories of old DKC games from SNES while also kicking my butt with difficult platforming challenges. This is a beautiful game that deserves to be played by all fans of platformers.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Brings back many memories of playing video games with my siblings when I was younger. I love this game! Felt good to have a classic-feeling game with a modern gaming system.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudnall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game !!! Great on wiiu but AMAZING on switch !! I love funky mode . It doesn’t make the game too easy either . I highly recommend this game .
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect, But Perfectly Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun Game, Gorgeous Graphics. We own the original on Wii U as well and there is some noticeable differences in load time and graphics that make this a winner. Also, the additional Kong character adds a fun new element.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun, memories of old Donkey Kong
customer_reviews.text: Hours and hours of fun! Love the graphics, but that it is 2-D as well. Sometimes nice to have the relief from having to control direction of travel. Great family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kmom

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard
customer_reviews.text: I hate this game. I played donkey Kong on DS forever ago and loved it. This version is unnecessarily hard and difficult to navigate. It was a lot of money which is unfortunate since it’s a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Fun and pretty game
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the classic DKC games, but of course with better graphics and some interesting camera work. Truly a great game. Also, love Amazon's release day delivery and pre-order price guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: ANC87

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ughhhh SO into our Switch and love this game. Pretty challenging but also good for people who grew up with 2-D left-to-right games.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best and most reminiscent games I've played on the switch. Remind me of my N64 back in the day 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: logan walton

customer_reviews.title: There's an easy mode, but I prefer playing on the harder ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised this is meant for kids because this game is a little difficult. There's an easy mode, but I prefer playing on the harder difficulty. The music is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hava

customer_reviews.title: Monkey Business can be serious and fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is challenging but fun. Brings back good memories of the N64 days. If you like Mario you will love DK.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Cappuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, punishing, game
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorites on the Wii U -- great to see it again here in all of its (improved) glory. Great game.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: it begins to feel like torture having to continue to miss jumps and the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay the first 3mins...after this, it begins to feel like torture having to continue to miss jumps and the constant redo's. Very frustrating. I thought it would feel like the SNES DK Country, but instead a torture match of making the correct jumps before a platform falls. Thinking about it...I only enjoyed first 1 min of this game. Not enjoyable, but stressful lol I don't think this was a wise purchase....def pass.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old grandson loved his birthday gift for his new Nintendo Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Prizeman

customer_reviews.title: Middle-Aged Husband Rates This A 3
customer_reviews.text: My middle-aged husband, who got this game for Christmas, gave it a 3. When asked why, he said because I believe it is an average game so I gave it an average rating.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Funky
customer_reviews.text: Lots of hidden items, great for 2 player coop play. Lives up to DKs of the past, solid game.
customer_reviews.author: Ambjor

customer_reviews.title: Game not included
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the game was not inlcuded in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great soundtrack
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, great soundtrack, and just plain fun. It can be difficult at times though. My 7 year old can play pretty easily with Funky Kong.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m 29 and love this game as much as my 6 year old, maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Long

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Hook Me
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some of the other Switch games I've purchased this one didn't hook me. I think it was a little too "boring" of a game

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: A mice platformer. Lush and beautiful. The controls are nice.
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lot of fun. The wife and I are playing it together ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot of fun. The wife and I are playing it together and having a great time. We both grew up with the Super Nintendo ones and this reminds us both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Key to life ;~PB
customer_reviews.text: The first to apologize is the bravest. The first to forgive is the strongest, and the first to forget is the happiest. ;~PB
customer_reviews.author: ; ~ PB

customer_reviews.title: Fun and well designed game.
customer_reviews.text: This isnt my all time favorite game but it's fun and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: A. Guisgand

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game, good reminder of classic SNES game but with more perks and even more challenging

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Me and my nephew played this for hours and had so much fun. Donkey Kong was me and my sisters favorite childhood game and I really enjoyed this version too.

customer_reviews.title: I love dkc! But this game is hard
customer_reviews.text: The game is frustratingly hard because the controls are just not that easy to get a handle on. And I've played all the SNES versions of DKC
customer_reviews.author: Dmh529

customer_reviews.title: DK
customer_reviews.text: Fun with that nostalgic feeling! REALLY loved Dk as a kid, still just as fun to play with, with the family, the safe mode is good for kids so you don't have to help theme very 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday. He loves it and it’s the only game that little sister will play with him. That is, Until Dad takes over!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: Game is a fantastic port with an added easy mode for new comers. The switch is perfect for multiplayer.

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Donkey Kong Country
customer_reviews.text: It's like one of the old Donkey Kong Country games. It can be hard if you're trying to get 100% completion; otherwise, the game is very playable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mickey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT GIFT FOR MY NEPHEW...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew LOVES this game, and I'm a great guy for having it delivered to his house on release day... what could be better?

customer_reviews.title: Donkey Kong
customer_reviews.text: A favorite with all game players and especially my granddaughter.

customer_reviews.title: Good game for 5 and up
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my son he loves the game and he is 5

customer_reviews.title: Empty case
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was not sealed. Opened up the case and there was no game cartridge. Clearly this was not a new item as advertised and it didn’t even have the game. One very disappointed kiddo. I will be returning the empty case for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pugsnotdrugs

customer_reviews.title: The Game of the Decade.
customer_reviews.text: Funky Kong is love. Funky Kong is life. Funky Mode... activate. A 10/10 overall.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Switch games I have played. If you are a fan of Dk, this will not disappoint.

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult but doable with persistence.
customer_reviews.text: It only took me a year and a half to beat very casually. Very difficult game but cute graphics and fun gameplay. The controls were a but tough and precision was a must as well as extra lives.
customer_reviews.author: Le Fou

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Nostalgia! Fun stuff. Should have let you use diddy daisy barrells while playing as Funky though. Good puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Review of product
customer_reviews.text: The game is really good. The game has evolve a lot, but it keeps its own identity from the Super Nintendo game.

customer_reviews.title: Kid at hearts rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Nostalgia takes over, and well we love it. Different but just as fun as before.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but hard
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun 2 player game but it is a bit hard and the controls aren't that intuitive.

customer_reviews.title: Love It--brings back old memories of Donkey Kong Country
customer_reviews.text: Love It--brings back old memories of Donkey Kong Country, except now I don't play as well as I used to;)

customer_reviews.title: Best of old school and new school
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and it brings back memories for me from my teen years.

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing the SNES DK games. This one adds new features while still staying true to the nostalgic side-scrolling multiplayer platformer that we all know and love.

customer_reviews.text: The game was fun and challenging but shorter than anticipated.

customer_reviews.title: This game is really good on the switch
customer_reviews.text: This game is really good on the switch, I never played the original on the Wii U, so I did not mind it was a switch port.

customer_reviews.title: Easy game
customer_reviews.text: I’m really stumped on how to rate this game. My 8 y/o son really wanted this for Christmas. He played it for only 2 days and already beat the whole game. It’s a great game with cool graphics but I’d expect a little more game play than 2 days for the price; especially for an 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Best game on Wii U, greater still on Switch
customer_reviews.text: Best Wii U game for me, so easily worth another buy. If you haven't played it, do so. The game is truly phenomenal.

customer_reviews.title: ... birthday gift for my son and he is very happy with this game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son and he is very happy with this game.

customer_reviews.title: great game but carbon copy of the wii u game.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun 2d platform but it feels like any other dk country game with controls music etc. If you have it for the wii u then don't get it because it basically is a carbon copy. Overall it is a really solid 2d platformer.

customer_reviews.text: Had my donkey on Wii U, now he's back on Switch. Small world, eh?

customer_reviews.title: European version not the US version like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize that I was getting the European version of the game even though it’s supposed to be the US version that is in the picture. It still plays but I’m also kinda wondering what’s goin on. I went over the listing after n didn’t see anything about it. I don’t like the kinda air of shadiness when I think about it n when I see the cover.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Games
customer_reviews.text: This is up there as one of the best Donkey Kong games. Great game.

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Swith and games
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren loved it, I ask them if they like it and they said, no I love iy

product_meta.title: Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze - Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo SwitchBarrel-blast into a critically acclaimed Donkey Kong adventure as this beloved franchise makes its Nintendo Switch debut with a banana-bunch of new features. Traverse islands packed with platforming perfection and nonstop action as the classic Kongs in the original game, or mix things up by playing the story as Funky Kong in new Funky Mode!
feature_bullets: Explore levels that twist, turn, and transform in unexpected ways, while the game’s dynamic rotating camera helps you fully enjoy this game’s diverse, vibrant islands.

Master a range of special moves, including unique abilities like Diddy Kong’s jet pack, Dixie Kong’s spinning ponytail, and Cranky Kong’s cane bounce. ESRB Content: Mild Cartoon Violence; Genre: Platformer, Action
Overcome challenges, battle frosty foes and bosses, and reclaim the Kongs’ stolen home.
Seek out a wealth of collectibles that’ll enable you to unlock additional content and stock up on useful items.

Enjoy all the fun and challenge of the original game, plus an optional new mode that makes the game more accessible to younger and less experienced players, as well as those looking for a more relaxed gaming experience.
For the first time ever in the Donkey Kong Country series, play as Funky Kong
Funky Kong has extra hearts and helpful abilities like double jump, hover, infinite rolls, infinite underwater corkscrews, and spike resistance.
Share the adventure with a friend During 2 player co op gameplay, each player can use a single Joy Con controller, so no additional accessories are required.
